Plot: A young girl takes a hard task. She must try to save her brothers and get rid of the curse placed on them by their mother. It is a story of courage, perseverance, but also of the power of words, truth and true love.
Title: The Seven Ravens
Writer: Alice Nellis (screenplay), Alice Nellis, Bozena Nemcová (story)
Actors: Martha Issová, Sabina Remundová, Lukás Príkazský, Václav Neuzil
